meanings.definition: A method for determining the concentration or potency of a substance by observing its effect on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists used bioassays to see how a new medicine affected the tiny fish.
meanings.sent2: The lab conducted bioassays to measure the strength of the pesticide.
meanings.sent3: The bioassays on the plants made them the stars of the science show.
meanings.sent4: In the world of research, bioassays act as detectives uncovering the secrets of substances.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as students prepared for their bioassays on earthworms.

meanings.definition: The use of living organisms to test the toxicity of chemicals or drugs.
meanings.sent1: Bioassays helped determine if the new chemical was harmful to the insects.
meanings.sent2: The company relied on bioassays to ensure the safety of their products.
meanings.sent3: The bioassays turned the lab into a mini jungle of testing creatures.
meanings.sent4: The bioassays were like bodyguards protecting us from dangerous substances.
meanings.sent5: The bioassays painted a vivid picture of the chemical's impact on the environment.

meanings.definition: An experiment that measures the biological activity of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The bioassays revealed the true power of the new drug on cells.
meanings.sent2: Researchers conducted bioassays to study the effects of the plant extract.
meanings.sent3: The bioassays turned the lab into a bustling hub of scientific activity.
meanings.sent4: Bioassays are like detectives investigating the behavior of substances.
meanings.sent5: The bioassays brought the invisible effects of the substance to light.
